/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are modern and tall, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars and taxis are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and activity in this part of the city.
